description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(130).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,114,0,0,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[ 1, 2, 5, 112, 229, 570 ]; [n le 6 select I[n] else 114*Self(n-3)+Self(n-6): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 13 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
